str2: Therefore, then. Apparently a primary word; certainly, or accordingly.
Of Hebrew origin; Jesus, the name of our Lord and two other Israelites.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From apo and krino; to conclude for oneself, i.e. to respond; by Hebraism to begin to speak.
Of Hebrew origin; properly, firm, i.e. trustworthy; adverbially, surely.
Of Hebrew origin; properly, firm, i.e. trustworthy; adverbially, surely.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A son, descendent. Apparently a primary word; a 'son', used very widely of immediate, remote or figuratively, kinship.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (a) I am powerful, have (the) power, (b) I am able, I can. Of uncertain affinity; to be able or possible.
(a) I make, manufacture, construct, (b) I do, act, cause. Apparently a prolonged form of an obsolete primary; to make or do.
No one, none, nothing.
From, away from. A primary particle; 'off, ' i.e. Away, in various senses.

parse: Reflexive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: Himself, herself, itself.
If. From ei and an; a conditional particle; in case that, provided, etc.

parse: Verb - Present Subjunctive Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (primarily physical), I look, see, perceive, discern. A primary verb; to look at.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Father, (Heavenly) Father, ancestor, elder, senior. Apparently a primary word; a 'father'.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Accusative Masculine Singular
str2: (a) I make, manufacture, construct, (b) I do, act, cause. Apparently a prolonged form of an obsolete primary; to make or do.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Accusative Neuter Singular
str2: Any one, some one, a certain one or thing. An enclitic indefinite pronoun; some or any person or object.
For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Accusative Neuter Plural
str2: Who, which, what, that.
That, that one there, yonder. From ekei; that one (neuter) thing); often intensified by the article prefixed.

A son, descendent. Apparently a primary word; a 'son', used very widely of immediate, remote or figuratively, kinship.
And, even, also, namely.
